Orochimaru, in his [[Living Corpse Reincarnation|true form]], attacks the opponent with a multitude of white snakes from his own body and finishes the opponent with a slash from his [[Sword of Kusanagi (Orochimaru)|Sword of Kusanagi]] that came out of his mouth.
